name: NIU Technologies
description: NIU Technologies is a leading designer and manufacturer of smart electric scooters and two-wheeled vehicles, headquartered in Beijing, China. Founded in 2014, NIU has quickly established a reputation for innovation and quality in the electric mobility sector. The company aims to redefine urban transportation by providing sustainable, efficient, and stylish mobility solutions. NIU's products are characterized by their cutting-edge technology, including smart connectivity features that allow users to track their scooters via a mobile app, monitor battery levels, and receive real-time alerts. The company offers a range of models, including the NIU N-Series, M-Series, and U-Series, which cater to diverse consumer preferences and urban commuting needs. NIU also focuses on sustainability, contributing to reduced traffic congestion and pollution in rapidly urbanizing areas. With a commitment to enhancing the user experience, NIU continues to innovate by integrating advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and IoT capabilities into its scooters. As a pioneer in the electric scooter market, NIU is dedicated to shaping the future of urban mobility and making sustainable transport accessible to everyone.
